name: Sweet Spot 15
description:
There is no getting away from the benefit of more extended steady efforts. To improve the stimulus of this type of training even further, these are the perfect prelude to finish with repeated, high power, short efforts. Today we have a 2 x 15min Sweetspot effort finished with 3 x 1min high cadence, anaerobic intervals.
